attributes.additional_details: Sign this to stop the Remain favouring elites granting the Remain campaign another referendum because they didn't get the result they wanted.
attributes.background:
The Leave campaign may have won by a small majority, but it was a majority.
To grant Remain another referendum simply because they didn't get their own way is undemocratic and downright wrong! It is also a waste of money. 

Our democracy works on the 50+1 rule.

The people have spoken!
